title: 1907 Southern Michigan Champs Postcard w/ Fred Merkle
author: stclaircards

posts.post_title: 1907 Southern Michigan Champs Postcard w/ Fred Merkle
posts.post_content: 1907 Southern Michigan Champs Postcard w/ Fred Merkle.  Merkle is directly behind the man with the bowtie. No creases. Has been postally used. $SOLD which includes shipping with delivery confirmation. Commitment to buy will take precedence over any ongoing conversations.
